action.action-desc: Mr. Barr introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to prohibit discrimination based on energy source in the use of certain authorities under title I and title III of such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strategic Resources Non-discrimination Act.

section.header: Limitations on certain authorities under the Defense Production Act of 1950

subsection.text: Section 101(c)(1) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 (50 U.S.C. 4511(c)(1)) is amended by inserting , other than for purposes of environmental protection, after domestic energy supplies.

subsection.header: Prohibition on discrimination based on industry
subsection.text: Title III of the Defense Production Act of 1950 (50 U.S.C. 4531 et seq.) is amended by adding at the end the following:

section.header: Prohibition on discrimination based on energy source
section.text: In using the authorities under this title, the President may not deny financial support pursuant to sections 301, 302, or 303, other than for the production of energy, based on engagement by a person in the exploration, development, production, utilization, transportation, or sale of fossil fuel-based energy.
